https://tmrev.io/movie/476217-Cirque du Soleil: Luzia 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2nZuGuxyuNvT0z0QoM9rLU1Ibgi.jpg LUZIA takes you to an imaginary Mexico, like in a waking dream, where light (“luz” in Spanish) quenches the spirit and rain (“lluvia”) soothes the soul. With a surrealistic series of grand visual surprises and breathtaking acrobatic performances, LUZIA cleverly brings to the stage multiple places, faces and sounds of Mexico taken from both tradition and modernity. Cirque du Soleil: Luzia
